title: Animated Laughs: humorous student shorts
abstract: Tickle your funny bone with these RMIT animated shorts.
description: To coincide with the Melbourne International Comedy Festival, we have put together this compilation of short animations, as produced by RMIT AIM (Animation and Interactive Media) students. These shorts embrace puppetry, computer and hand drawn animation, all to humorous effect.
